content.text:
# List of presidents of Austria__disambig_1

This is a list of presidents of Austria since the establishment of that office in 1919.
List of officeholders (1920–present)
Presidents of Austria during the Interwar period

| died_year         = 1950

| term_end          = 9 December 1920

Austria was part of Nazi Germany from 12 March 1938 to 13 April 1945.

Timeline
Colors =
id:independent value:gray(0.8) legend:None_(Independent)
id:CSP         value:yellow    legend:Christian_Social_Party
id:FF          value:purple    legend:Fatherland_Front
id:SDPA        value:red       legend:Social_Democratic_Party_of_Austia
id:APP         value:black     legend:Austrian_People's_Party
id:FPA         value:blue      legend:Freedom_Party_of_Austia
id:DGA         value:green     legend:The_Greens
id:gray1  value:gray(0.85)
id:gray2  value:gray(0.95)
DateFormat = dd/mm/yyyy
Period     = from:01/01/1920 till:$today
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = unit:year increment:5 start:1920
ScaleMinor = unit:year increment:1 start:1920
Legend     = columns:1 left:150 top:35 columnwidth:170
TextData =
pos:(20,38) textcolor:black fontsize:M
text:"Political party:"
BarData =
bar:Seitz
bar:Hainisch
bar:Miklas
bar:Nazi
bar:Renner
bar:Körner
bar:Schärf
bar:Jonas
bar:Kirchschläger
bar:Waldheim
bar:Klestil
bar:Fischer
bar:Bellen
PlotData =
width:5 align:left fontsize:9 shift:(5,-4) anchor:till
bar: Seitz
from: 10/11/1920 till: 09/12/1920 color:SDPA        text:"Karl Seitz" (de facto)
bar: Hainisch
from: 09/12/1920 till: 10/12/1928 color:independent text:"Michael Hainisch"
bar: Miklas
from: 10/12/1928 till: 20/05/1933 color:CSP
from: 20/05/1933 till: 13/03/1938 color:FF          text:"Wilhelm Miklas"
bar: Renner
from: 20/12/1945 till: 31/12/1950 color:SDPA        text:"Karl Renner"
bar: Körner
from: 21/06/1951 till: 04/01/1957 color:SDPA        text:"Theodor Körner"
bar: Schärf
from: 22/05/1957 till: 28/02/1965 color:SDPA        text:"Adolf Schärf"
bar: Jonas
from: 09/06/1965 till: 24/04/1974 color:SDPA        text:"Franz Jonas"
bar: Kirchschläger
from: 08/07/1974 till: 08/07/1986 color:independent text:"Rudolf Kirchschläger"
bar: Waldheim
from: 08/07/1986 till: 08/07/1992 color:APP         text:"Kurt Waldheim"
bar: Klestil
from: 08/07/1992 till: 06/07/2004 color:APP         text:"Thomas Klestil"
bar: Fischer
from: 08/07/2004 till: 08/07/2016 color:SDPA        text:"Heinz Fischer"
bar: Bellen
from: 26/01/2017 till: $today     color:DGA         text:"Alexander Van der Bellen"
}}
Graphical representation
This is a graphical lifespan timeline of the Presidents of Austria since 1945. They are listed in order of first assuming office.
ImageSize = width:930 height:auto barincrement:25
PlotArea  = right:10 left:1 bottom:160 top:60
Period    = from:$start till:$end
TimeAxis  = orientation:horizontal
Legend    = orientation:vertical columns:1 left:0 top:50 columnwidth:500
Colors =
id:bg              value:white
id:lightline       value:rgb(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
id:lighttext       value:rgb(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
id:LIFESPAN        value:rgb(0.88, 0.90, 0.70) Legend: Lifespan
id:PRES_SPÖ        value:rgb(0.8, 0.2, 0.2) Legend: Social_Democratic_Party
id:PRES_ÖVP        value:rgb(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Legend: Austrian_People's_Party
id:PRES_INDEP      value:gray(0.8)   Legend: Independent
id:PRES_GREENS     value:rgb(0.2,0.7,0.2) Legend: Greens
id:NAME            value:rgb(0.15, 0.13, 0.05)
id:TODAY           value:green
BackgroundColors = canvas:bg
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:lightline unit:year increment:1 start:$start
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:lighttext unit:year increment:10 start:1870
LineData=
at:$now color:TODAY width:0.1
PlotData=
bar:1
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1869        till:1920.97 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Karl Seitz
color:PRES_SPÖ
from:1920.97     till:1920.99
color:LIFESPAN
from:1920.99     till:1950.99
bar:2
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1858        till:1920.97 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Michael Hainisch
color:PRES_INDEP
from:1920.97     till:1928.99
color:LIFESPAN
from:1928.99     till:1940.99
bar:3
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1872        till:1928.97 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Wilhelm Miklas
color:PRES_ÖVP
from:1928.97     till:1938.99
color:LIFESPAN
from:1938.99     till:1956.99
bar:4
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1870        till:1945.97 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Karl Renner
color:PRES_SPÖ
from:1945.97     till:1950.99
color:LIFESPAN
from:1950.99     till:1950.99
bar:5
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1873        till:1951.47 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Theodor Körner
color:PRES_SPÖ
from:1951.47     till:1957.01
color:LIFESPAN
from:1957.01     till:1957.01
bar:6
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1890         till:1957.39 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Adolf Schärf
color:PRES_SPÖ
from:1957.39      till:1965.15
color:LIFESPAN
from:1965.15      till:1965.15
bar:7
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1899         till:1965.44 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Franz Jonas
color:PRES_SPÖ
from:1965.44      till:1974.31
color:LIFESPAN
from:1974.31      till:1974.31
bar:8
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1915        till:1974.52 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Rudolf Kirchschläger
color:PRES_INDEP
from:1974.52     till:1986.52
color:LIFESPAN
from:1986.52     till:2000.23
bar:9
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1918        till:1986.52 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Kurt Waldheim
color:PRES_ÖVP
from:1986.52     till:1992.52
color:LIFESPAN
from:1992.52     till:2007.45
bar:10
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1932         till:1992.52 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Thomas Klestil
color:PRES_ÖVP
from:1992.52      till:2004.51
color:LIFESPAN
from:2004.51      till:2004.51
bar:11
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1938        till:2004.52 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Heinz Fischer
color:PRES_SPÖ
from:2004.52     till:2016.52
color:LIFESPAN
from:2016.52     till:$now
bar:12
width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1944        till:2017.07 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Alexander Van der Bellen
color:PRES_GREENS
from:2017.07     till:$now
color:LIFESPAN
from:$now        till:$now
TextData =
fontsize:M
textcolor:green
pos:($warning,140)
text:Updated /
}}
